hp-hero-hd: Enjoy no rate rises for 2 years with Essentials Plus
hp-hero-body: No Lock-in contract or exit fee + up to $160 bonus credits
hp-hero-disclaimer:
Available to VIC residential customers with monthly e-billing. 
Credits: $20 for electricity and $20 for gas paid every six months over two years.
plp-plan-desc: No frills, no gimmicks, no rate rises. Just low rates, guaranteed for 2 years with no lock-in contract.
plp-why-choose-hd-02: Essentials Plus helps keep things simple. No confusing discounts, just simple low electricity and gas rates. Get certainty with fixed rates that energy prices won’t go up for 2 years. The flexibility of no lock-in contract means you can change your plan at any time.
plp-why-choose-hd-03: Benefit from discounts and rewards with AGL including a loyalty bonus paid every 6 months for 2 years, plus 10,000 flybuys bonus points when you sign up online and more.
plp-feature-block-01-bd: No confusing discounts, just simple low electricity and gas rates.
plp-feature-block-02-bd: Get peace of mind that your rates won't go up for 2 years. That’s zero increases – no matter what happens with industry rates.
plp-feature-block-03-bd: We reward loyalty. Get $40 bonus paid every 6 months for 2 years.
plp-feature-block-04-bd: Benefit from 24/7 customer service Help when you need it
plp-feature-block-05-hd: Commitment free with no lock-in contracts
plp-feature-block-05-bd: With no lock-in contract you can change your plan at any time.
plp-feature-block-06-hd: Online sign up rewards with AGL
plp-feature-block-06-bd: Access discounts from over 100 retailers: groceries, fuel, cinema & more.
plp-feature-block-07-hd: Flexible payment options to suit you
plp-feature-block-07-bd: Choose a range of clean energy options - solar, carbon offset, green power.
plp-feature-block-08-bd: Choose to pay by Paypal, direct debit, credit card, bank transfer & more
plp-statement-hd: People choose AGL for a good reason
plp-statement-bd: Providing Australian energy to your home is just the tip of what we offer.
plp-why-point-01-bd: We have 3.6 million customer accounts and counting
plp-why-point-02-bd: AGL is the lead ASX-listed investor in renewable energy & offers green energy options
plp-why-point-03-bd: It’s quick and easy to switch or sign up to AGL online.
plp-green-bd: Manage your electricity and gas accounts wherever, whenever with the AGL Energy App. View bills, update details, enter meter readings and more.
plp-statement-02-bd: We strive to provide plans to suit your different needs.
